answerText: Alice Adams[10] This author of Alice Adams wrote of John Harkless's quest to free Plattville from the corruption of the "White Caps" in The Gentleman from Indiana as well as a novel about the title family of George Minafer.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 4 | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Walter is caught cavorting with a prostitute and is then pressured to work in his father's glue factory.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel, in which the protagonist wants to wed Arthur Russell, so her family lies to impress him. By the end, Arthur discovers some of their lies, including the secret of Virgil's factory, and his romance with title character ends forever.
